page.description: Rounds a number down to the specified number of decimal places
page.syntax: Result as N = round_down(N number [,N decimal_places ])

argument.name: Result
argument.description: A version of the number truncated to Decimal_Places decimal places.

argument.name: decimal_places
argument.description: The number of decimal places to keep.

page.discussion: The ROUND_DOWN() function rounds a number down to the specified number of decimal places.
page.example: ? round_down(pi) = 3 ? round_down(pi,1) = 3.1 ? round_down(pi,2) = 3.14 ? round_down(pi,3) = 3.141 ? round_down(pi,4) = 3.1415 ? round_down(pi,5) = 3.14159
